```js
class AppSwitcherExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      open: false,
      apps: [
        {
          icon: "contacts",
          label: "Admin"
        },
        {
          icon: "directions_car",
          label: "Vehicle"
        },
        {
          icon: "phone",
          label: "Prospect"
        },
        {
          icon: "assignment",
          label: "Sign"
        },
        {
          icon: "monetization_on",
          label: "Quote Express"
        },
        {
          icon: "folder_shared",
          label: "Consumer"
        }
      ],
      selected: ""
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <MenuAnchor>
        <Button onClick={() => this.setState({ open: true })}>Open</Button>

        <AppSwitcher
          open={this.state.open}
          onCancel={() => this.setState({ open: false })}
        >
          <AppSwitcherHome onClick={() => this.setState({ open: false })}>
            Back to Connect Portal
          </AppSwitcherHome>

          <AppSwitcherItems>
            {this.state.apps.map(({ icon, label }, index) => (
              <AppSwitcherItem
                key={index}
                onClick={() => this.setState({ open: false, selected: label })}
              >
                <AppSwitcherItemIcon>
                  <Icon>{icon}</Icon>
                </AppSwitcherItemIcon>
                <AppSwitcherItemText>{label}</AppSwitcherItemText>
              </AppSwitcherItem>
            ))}
          </AppSwitcherItems>
        </AppSwitcher>

        <p>Last selected app: {this.state.selected}</p>
      </MenuAnchor>
    );
  }
}

<AppSwitcherExample />;
```
